Ciipher

Introduction

Hyun Bin is a South Korean singer under Rain Company. He first appeared and competed in the boy group survival program "Produce X 101" where he finished 32nd place. In 2021, he made his official debut as the leader of the boy group CIIPHER.

in 2023, he was introduced as one of the participants of the MBC survival show "Fantasy Boys."
